https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/j7SAGtw8RtcgLXFMhrWNR28mqqv.jpg A documentary on American composer George Antheil (1900-1959) featuring excerpts from Leger's Ballet Mecanique (1924) for which Antheil wrote the music. Bad Boy Made Good: The Revival of George Antheil's 1924 Ballet Mécanique
